qas.question: What feature does Southampton have plenty of that provides for water sports and yachting?
What race named after a car company used to be hosted in Southampton?
What was the former name of the Volvo Ocean Race?

answers.text: the Whitbread Around the World Yacht Race

qas.question: Which marina in Southampton hosted the yacht race from 1977 too 2001?

context: The city provides for yachting and water sports, with a number of <a0_0>marinas<a0_0/>. From 1977 to 2001 <a2_0>the Whitbread Around the World Yacht Race<a2_0/>, which is now known as <a1_0>the Volvo Ocean Race<a1_0/> was based in Southampton's <a3_0>Ocean Village marina<a3_0/>.
